verses.roman:
ihāra pramāṇa śuna--śāstrera vyākhyāna
mahad-anubhava yāte sudṛḍha pramāṇa

synonyms: ihāra—of this; pramāṇa—evidence; śuna—please hear; śāstrera vyākhyāna—the description in the revealed scriptures; mahat-anubhava—the conception of great souls; yāte—by which; su-dṛḍha—strong; pramāṇa—evidence.
translation: For evidence, please listen to the examples described in the revealed scriptures, which are also corroborated by the realization of great souls.
